description: A strikingly beautiful and enigmatic man whose physical perfection masks a deeply troubled inner life. Dorian is at the center of the narrative, battling the dichotomy of eternal youth versus a soul corrupted by sins and vanity.
personality: Deeply introspective and conflicted, Dorian is both self-absorbed and tormented. He oscillates between the seductive lure of hedonism and a yearning for redemption. His inner turmoil is reflected in his occasional bouts of guilt and his reflective, sometimes self-loathing, thoughts about the nature of his beauty and past actions.
voice: Likely refined and smooth, with a tone that can shift from detached elegance to moments of poignant vulnerability. His speech might be marked by careful, measured diction that resonates with the cultured, aristocratic background he embodies.
appearance: Exquisitely handsome with an eternally youthful face that belies his inner decay. He is well-dressed in fashionable and impressive evening attire—wearing a coat slung casually over his arm and a silk scarf, presenting an image of effortless charm and high social grace.
